application.name: dempack
application.brief: Creates an XML representation of DEM installation packs

description.p: This program creates an XML document of "pack" elements for use within the Isis installer. Each pack represent an optional installation package for the user, enabling them to select the targets they are working with, and only download the relevant DEMs. This XML file is generated from the kernels.????.db file in the $base/dems area.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: The DB file used to generate the new XML file. Defaulted to use $ISIS3DATA/base/dems/kernels.????.db

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: Newly generated XML description of the DEMs available in ISIS.
